item.title: O'Reilly Strata Conference
item.description: O’Reilly Strata Conference # Title: O’Reilly Strata Conference Location: Santa Clara Link out: Click here<br />Description: Early next February O’Reilly is planning to put on a very interesting conference on the topic of data analysis and the business of generating value from raw digital data. I’m really glad to have received the acceptance notification for my presentation and travel sponsorship from the DICODE project. So see you in Santa Clara.
